amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Future Vertical Lift Advanced Technologies program from $16 million to $25 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to increase funding for the Future Vertical Lift Advanced Technologies program from $16 million to $25 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A102) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 39 (Roll no. 347).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A102) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 39 (Roll no. 347).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A102) offered by Mr. Visclosky.
